about_the_game:
The illustration Sing Me a Pumpkin is our two-piece debut of the Bulgarian illustrator Stanislav Karmashikov. This puzzle box is part of our special Halloween Edition series and will be released during our Halloween 2018 event. We hope you will appreciate the fun and very unique art, the great illustration, and have a great time building this puzzle in all the available variations.


Apart from the usual completion achievements, this puzzle box comes with a very special and limited achievement! Make sure to complete this puzzle in any tileset configuration during the Halloween Special Event in order to get it and see what it is.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, and 2000 puzzle tiles. The HD image is the original digital illustration as provided by the author and provides a good level of detail. This puzzle is somewhat challenging as it has a large area consisting of similar details, but it also provides a multitude of unique details to help you reconstruct that area around them. Beginners might find it slightly more difficult when compared to skilled puzzle builders, who should find the image a relaxing and fun experience.
detailed_description:
The illustration Sing Me a Pumpkin is our two-piece debut of the Bulgarian illustrator Stanislav Karmashikov. This puzzle box is part of our special Halloween Edition series and will be released during our Halloween 2018 event. We hope you will appreciate the fun and very unique art, the great illustration, and have a great time building this puzzle in all the available variations.


Apart from the usual completion achievements, this puzzle box comes with a very special and limited achievement! Make sure to complete this puzzle in any tileset configuration during the Halloween Special Event in order to get it and see what it is.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, and 2000 puzzle tiles. The HD image is the original digital illustration as provided by the author and provides a good level of detail. This puzzle is somewhat challenging as it has a large area consisting of similar details, but it also provides a multitude of unique details to help you reconstruct that area around them. Beginners might find it slightly more difficult when compared to skilled puzzle builders, who should find the image a relaxing and fun experience.

  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 720p Capable Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
